column1: Little Goat Diner////I had the omelet of the day
column2: which had fresh corn saut√©ed with cream cheese
column5: and topped with a semisweet tomato jam. I also had a side of bacon
column6: which was probably one of the top 5 sides of bacon I've ever had. And I've had a lot of bacon in my life. I also had a taste of the Bullseye French Toast
column8: although I'm not a huge fan of soggy French Toast and it's pretty gooey on the inside.
